DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to assess the efficacy and safety of ondansetron to reduce cocaine use in subjects with cocaine dependence.
DOC.brief_title: Ondansetron for the Treatment of Cocaine Dependence - 1
DOC.detailed_description: Double-blind, placebo-controlled, 4-parallel group design to assess the efficacy and safety of 3 wide range doses of ondansetron to reduce cocaine use in subjects with cocaine dependence and to determine the optimal dose of ondansetron.
DOC.criteria: Male/Female, at least 18 yrs of age; DSM4 diagnosis of cocaine dependence; seeking Treatment for cocaine dependence; have ability to understand, having understood and provide written consent; females of child bearing potential that use accepted method of birth control Additional criteria available during screening at the site.
